channel.title: Softlayer_account_shipment on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_account_shipment on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Account_Shipment
item.description: SoftLayer_Account_Shipment Service Datatype Description SoftLayer’s shipment service allows the user to access information pertaining to a shipment from the user to SoftLayer or from SoftLayer to the user. Methods editObject Edit a shipment record. getAccount Retrieve the account to which the shipment belongs. getAllCouriers Retrieve a list of available shipping couriers. getAllCouriersByType Retrieve a list of couriers for a given courier type getAllShipmentStatuses Retrieve a list of shipment statuses.

item.title: SoftLayer_Account_Shipment
item.description: SoftLayer_Account_Shipment Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Account_Shipment data type contains information relating to a shipment. Basic information such as addresses, the shipment courier, and any tracking information for as shipment is accessible with this data type. Local accountId The account id of the shipment. Type: integer courierId The courier id of the shipment. Type: integer courierName The courier name of the shipment.

item.title: editObject
item.description: SoftLayer_Account_Shipment::editObject Edit a shipment record. Overview Edit the properties of a shipment record by passing in a modified instance of a SoftLayer_Account_Shipment object. Parameters Name Type Description templateObject SoftLayer_Account_Shipment A skeleton SoftLayer_Account_Shipment object with only the properties defined that you wish to change. Unchanged properties are left alone. Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Account_ShipmentInitParameters Optional Headers Return Values boolean
